The game is just a classic bringing a new concept of unique spray patterns for each gun. There are multiple game modes that allow more than just a players vs players. The one and only thing that there is to complain about is some problems it feels like with guns. you can aim at someones head and shoot while they are standing still and some how it doesn't even hit them while other players whip there head around shooting anywhere near you and getting a headshot.

I'm new to Counter-Strike and I realized that there are too many cheaters in this game. I bought Prime thinking that it would prevent me from being matched with cheaters, however that wasn't the case. I found myself to be put up against (sometimes with) cheaters. They would instantly head-shot me the second they came around a corner, or they would jump around at miraculous speed. Some would even shoot me through walls without me even knowing they were there.

CS:GO's fatal flaw is that there is a vast amount of cheaters. From what I heard is that I have to play more in order to be matched against non-cheaters, but the cheating drives me to not play CS:GO.

I honestly don't recommend, even though I really do enjoy the game, I just wish there could be something done to remove the cheaters.
